The video was published on October 14: 2019, in a Facebook post and has been viewed over 23,000 times.
The video was also shared on multiple pl: including Facebook and Twitter, with similar claims.
A search on Google using keywords relate: 2019, with a title mentioning actress Rashmi Mishra performing the dance.
The Powai Bengali Welfare Association: PBWA) confirmed that the woman in the video is actress Rashmi Mishra, not Indian Muslim lawmaker Nusrat Jahan.
